Package de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mapping

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDataStoreSynchronizer<T>
    An IDataStoreSynchronizer is used during the mapping process to check, wether the underlaying table / collection should be created or modified
    IField
    Describes a java field of an IMapper
    IKeyGenerator
    The IKeyGenerator is used to generate primary keys for new instances of an IMapper.
    IMapper<T>
    IMapper is responsible to collect information about the mapped class
    IMapperFactory
    IMapperFactory is responsible to create and store instances of IMapper for all classes, which shall be persisted into the datastore
    IMethodProxy
    A wrapper for a Method
    IObjectFactory
    IObjectFactory is used to create new instances for a mapper.
    IObjectReference
    An IObjectReference can be used as carrier for those fields, which are annotated as Referenced IObjectReferece is used, when objects are read from a datastore, which contain fields which are marked as Referenced.
    IPropertyAccessor
    An accessor to a property within a Java class, to read and write the value of a field.
    IPropertyMapper
    Defines how the structural process of writing and reading of a field is performed.
    IPropertyMapperFactory
    Factory to build instances of IPropertyMapper
    IStoreObject<T,F>
    The IStoreObject is building the bridge between the propriate format coming from out of the used IDataStore and the rest of the application.
    IStoreObjectFactory<F>
    A factory which creates instances of IStoreObject which are suitable for the current IDataStore
    ISyncCommand<T>
    Describes a synchronization step which was processed during initalization of a mapper
    ISyncResult<T>
    ISyncResult is the result, which is returned by the method IDataStoreSynchronizer.synchronize(IMapper, io.vertx.core.Handler) and which contains all relevant information for the synchronization process
    ITriggerContext
    An ITriggerContext can be used as argument for mapper methods, which are annotated by one of the annotations like BeforeSave, AfterSave etc.
    ITriggerContextFactory
    This factory is used to create instances of ITriggerContext which are then used for those mapper methods which are annotated by lifecycles like BeforeSave etc.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SyncAction
    This describes the action, which is performed by IDataStoreSynchronizer
